description.name: Hosting Renewal
description.tagline: Effortlessly renew hosting and domain services directly within WHMCS.
description.long: Hosting Renewal is a WHMCS addon designed to streamline the process of renewing hosting and domain services. It enables the automatic renewal of services, provides a detailed overview of upcoming renewals, and simplifies the management of service lifecycles.
features: View upcoming renewals and expiration dates
Integrate seamlessly with existing WHMCS services
